00025 #pragma once

00027 #include "std_ops"

00034 
00038 class Avl_tree_node : public Bits::Bst_node
00039 {
00040 private:
00041   template< typename Node, typename Get_key, typename Compare >
00042   friend class Avl_tree;
00043 
00045   typedef Bits::Direction Bal;
00047   typedef Bits::Direction Dir;
00048 
00050 
00051   using Bits::Bst_node::next;
00052   using Bits::Bst_node::next_p;
00053   using Bits::Bst_node::rotate;
00056 
00057   Bal _balance;
00058 
00059 protected:
00061   Avl_tree_node() {}
00062 
00063 private:
00065   Avl_tree_node(Avl_tree_node const &o);
00066 
00068   void operator = (Avl_tree_node const &o)
00069   {
00070     Bits::Bst_node::operator = (o);
00071     _balance = o._balance;
00072   }
00073 
00075   explicit Avl_tree_node(bool) : Bits::Bst_node(true), _balance(Dir::N) {}
00076 
00078   static Bits::Bst_node *rotate2(Bst_node **t, Bal idir, Bal pre);
00079 
00081   bool balanced() const { return _balance == Bal::N; }
00082 
00084   Bal balance() const { return _balance; }
00085 
00087   void balance(Bal b) { _balance = b; }
00088 };
00089 
00090 
00100 template< typename Node, typename Get_key,
00101           typename Compare = Lt_functor<typename Get_key::Key_type> >
00102 class Avl_tree : public Bits::Bst<Node, Get_key, Compare>
00103 {
00104 private:
00105   typedef Bits::Bst<Node, Get_key, Compare> Bst;
00106 
00108   using Bst::_head;
00109 
00111   using Bst::k;
00112 
00114   typedef typename Avl_tree_node::Bal Bal;
00116   typedef typename Avl_tree_node::Bal Dir;
00117 
00119   Avl_tree(Avl_tree const &o);
00120 
00122   void operator = (Avl_tree const &o);
00123 
00124 public:
00126   typedef typename Bst::Key_type Key_type;
00127   typedef typename Bst::Key_param_type Key_param_type;
00129 
00131 
00132 
00133   typedef typename Bst::Iterator Iterator;
00135   typedef typename Bst::Const_iterator Const_iterator;
00137   typedef typename Bst::Rev_iterator Rev_iterator;
00139   typedef typename Bst::Const_rev_iterator Const_rev_iterator;
00141 
00150   Pair<Node *, bool> insert(Node *new_node);
00151 
00158   Node *remove(Key_param_type key);
00162   Node *erase(Key_param_type key) { return remove(key); }
00163 
00165   Avl_tree() : Bst() {}
00167   ~Avl_tree()
00168   {
00169     Bits::Bst_node const *n;
00170     while ((n = _head))
00171       remove(k(n));
00172   }
00173 
00174 #ifdef __DEBUG_L4_AVL
00175   bool rec_dump(Avl_tree_node *n, int depth, int *dp, bool print, char pfx);
00176   bool rec_dump(bool print)
00177   {
00178     int dp=0;
00179     return rec_dump(static_cast<Avl_tree_node *>(_head), 0, &dp, print, '+');
00180   }
00181 #endif
00182 };
00183

00185 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00186 /* IMPLEMENTATION: Bits::__Bst_iter_b */
00187 
00188 
00189 inline
00190 Bits::Bst_node *
00191 Avl_tree_node::rotate2(Bst_node **t, Bal idir, Bal pre)
00192 {
00193   typedef Bits::Bst_node N;
00194   typedef Avl_tree_node A;
00195   N *tmp[2] = { *t, N::next(*t, idir) };
00196   *t = N::next(tmp[1], !idir);
00197   A *n = static_cast<A*>(*t);
00198 
00199   N::next(tmp[0], idir, N::next(n, !idir));
00200   N::next(tmp[1], !idir, N::next(n, idir));
00201   N::next(n, !idir, tmp[0]);
00202   N::next(n, idir, tmp[1]);
00203 
00204   n->balance(Bal::N);
00205 
00206   if (pre == Bal::N)
00207     {
00208       static_cast<A*>(tmp[0])->balance(Bal::N);
00209       static_cast<A*>(tmp[1])->balance(Bal::N);
00210       return 0;
00211     }
00212 
00213   static_cast<A*>(tmp[pre != idir])->balance(!pre);
00214   static_cast<A*>(tmp[pre == idir])->balance(Bal::N);
00215 
00216   return N::next(tmp[pre == idir], !pre);
00217 }
00218 
00219 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00220 /* Implementation of AVL Tree */
00221 
00222 /* Insert new _Node. */
00223 template< typename Node, typename Get_key, class Compare>
00224 Pair<Node *, bool>
00225 Avl_tree<Node, Get_key, Compare>::insert(Node *new_node)
00226 {
00227   typedef Avl_tree_node A;
00228   typedef Bits::Bst_node N;
00229   N **t = &_head; /* search variable */
00230   N **s = &_head; /* node where rebalancing may occur */
00231   Key_param_type new_key = Get_key::key_of(new_node);
00232 
00233   // search insertion point
00234   for (N *p; (p = *t);)
00235     {
00236       Dir b = this->dir(new_key, p);
00237       if (b == Dir::N)
00238   return pair(static_cast<Node*>(p), false);
00239 
00240       if (!static_cast<A const *>(p)->balanced())
00241   s = t;
00242 
00243       t = N::next_p(p, b);
00244     }
00245 
00246   *static_cast<A*>(new_node) = A(true);
00247   *t = new_node;
00248 
00249   N *n = *s;
00250   A *a = static_cast<A*>(n);
00251   if (!a->balanced())
00252     {
00253       A::Bal b(this->greater(new_key, n));
00254       if (a->balance() != b)
00255   {
00256     // ok we got in balance the shorter subtree go higher
00257     a->balance(Bal::N);
00258     // propagate the new balance down to the new node
00259     n = N::next(n, b);
00260   }
00261       else if (b == Bal(this->greater(new_key, N::next(n, b))))
00262   {
00263     // left-left or right-right case -> single rotation
00264     A::rotate(s, b);
00265     a->balance(Bal::N);
00266     static_cast<A*>(*s)->balance(Bal::N);
00267     n = N::next(*s, b);
00268   }
00269       else
00270   {
00271     // need a double rotation
00272     n = N::next(N::next(n, b), !b);
00273     n = A::rotate2(s, b, n == new_node ? Bal::N : Bal(this->greater(new_key, n)));
00274   }
00275     }
00276 
00277   for (A::Bal b; n && n != new_node; static_cast<A*>(n)->balance(b), n = N::next(n, b))
00278     b = Bal(this->greater(new_key, n));
00279 
00280   return pair(new_node, true);
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00284 /* remove an element */
00285 template< typename Node, typename Get_key, class Compare>
00286 inline
00287 Node *Avl_tree<Node, Get_key, Compare>::remove(Key_param_type key)
00288 {
00289   typedef Avl_tree_node A;
00290   typedef Bits::Bst_node N;
00291   N **q = &_head; /* search variable */
00292   N **s = &_head; /* last ('deepest') node on the search path to q
00293                    * with balance 0, at this place the rebalancing
00294                    * stops in any case */
00295   N **t = 0;
00296   Dir dir;
00297 
00298   // find target node and rebalancing entry
00299   for (N *n; (n = *q); q = N::next_p(n, dir))
00300     {
00301       dir = Dir(this->greater(key, n));
00302       if (dir == Dir::L && !this->greater(k(n), key))
00303   /* found node */
00304   t = q;
00305 
00306       if (!N::next(n, dir))
00307   break;
00308 
00309       A const *a = static_cast<A const *>(n);
00310       if (a->balanced() || (a->balance() == !dir && N::next<A>(n, !dir)->balanced()))
00311   s = q;
00312     }
00313 
00314   // noting found
00315   if (!t)
00316     return 0;
00317 
00318   A *i = static_cast<A*>(*t);
00319 
00320   for (N *n; (n = *s); s = N::next_p(n, dir))
00321     {
00322       dir = Dir(this->greater(key, n));
00323 
00324       if (!N::next(n, dir))
00325   break;
00326 
00327       A *a = static_cast<A*>(n);
00328       // got one out of balance
00329       if (a->balanced())
00330   a->balance(!dir);
00331       else if (a->balance() == dir)
00332   a->balance(Bal::N);
00333       else
00334   {
00335     // we need rotations to get in balance
00336     Bal b = N::next<A>(n, !dir)->balance();
00337     if (b == dir)
00338       A::rotate2(s, !dir, N::next<A>(N::next(n, !dir), dir)->balance());
00339     else
00340       {
00341         A::rotate(s, !dir);
00342         if (b != Bal::N)
00343     {
00344       a->balance(Bal::N);
00345       static_cast<A*>(*s)->balance(Bal::N);
00346     }
00347         else
00348     {
00349       a->balance(!dir);
00350       static_cast<A*>(*s)->balance(dir);
00351     }
00352       }
00353     if (n == i)
00354       t = N::next_p(*s, dir);
00355   }
00356     }
00357 
00358   A *n = static_cast<A*>(*q);
00359   *t = n;
00360   *q = N::next(n, !dir);
00361   *n = *i;
00362 
00363   return static_cast<Node*>(i);
00364 }
00365 
00366 #ifdef __DEBUG_L4_AVL
00367 template< typename Node, typename Get_key, class Compare>
00368 bool Avl_tree<Node, Get_key, Compare>::rec_dump(Avl_tree_node *n, int depth, int *dp, bool print, char pfx)
00369 {
00370   typedef Avl_tree_node A;
00371 
00372   if (!n)
00373     return true;
00374 
00375   int dpx[2] = {depth,depth};
00376   bool res = true;
00377 
00378   res = rec_dump(n->next<A>(Dir::R), depth + 1, dpx + 1, print, '/');
00379 
00380   if (print)
00381     {
00382       fprintf(stderr, "%2d: [%8p] b=%1d: ", depth, n, (int)n->balance().d);
00383 
00384       for (int i = 0; i < depth; ++i)
00385   std::cerr << "    ";
00386 
00387       std::cerr << pfx << (static_cast<Node*>(n)->item) << std::endl;
00388     }
00389 
00390   res = res & rec_dump(n->next<A>(Dir::L), depth + 1, dpx, print, '\\');
00391 
00392   int b = dpx[1] - dpx[0];
00393 
00394   if (b < 0)
00395     *dp = dpx[0];
00396   else
00397     *dp = dpx[1];
00398 
00399   Bal x = n->balance();
00400   if ((b < -1 || b > 1) ||
00401       (b == 0 && x != Bal::N) ||
00402       (b == -1 && x != Bal::L) ||
00403       (b == 1 && x != Bal::R))
00404     {
00405       if (print)
00406   fprintf(stderr, "%2d: [%8p] b=%1d: balance error %d\n", depth, n, (int)n->balance().d, b);
00407       return false;
00408     }
00409   return res;
00410 }
00411 #endif
00412 
00413 }

L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
